Material used.Material Name: Lymphoblastoid cell line / Blood cells from patient heterozygous for p.Ala53Thr
Material used.Description: Allelic expression and mRNA levels were analyzed in lymphoblastoid cell lines and blood cells from a patient heterozygous for p.Ala53Thr.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: Epigenetic silencing of mutant allele; upregulation of wild-type allele
Readout description.Result Description: The mutant allele (p.Ala53Thr) showed epigenetic silencing, while the wild-type allele exhibited increased mRNA expression. Allelic imbalance was confirmed with imbalanced expression levels between the two alleles.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the abstract.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the abstract.

Basic positive control.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the abstract.

Basic negative control.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the abstract.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Standard threshold for allelic expression balance (e.g., 50% expression per allele in heterozygotes)

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Significant allelic imbalance (e.g., >70% expression from one allele in heterozygotes)
